.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkSpecializationInfo-pMapEntries-parameter]] If pname:mapEntryCount is not `0`, pname:pMapEntries must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:mapEntryCount valid sname:VkSpecializationMapEntry structures
* [[VUID-VkSpecializationInfo-pData-parameter]] If pname:dataSize is not `0`, pname:pData must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:dataSize bytes
****
